name: Moss Stitch Cowl
description: This is a super-soft slightly textured cowl great for winter wear! The pattern is designed for the finished cowl to be as tall or short as you would like.
full_text: This is a super-soft slightly textured cowl great for winter wear! The pattern is designed for the finished cowl to be as tall or short as you would like. It is an easy 1-skein project and a 50g Bulky (5) ball could also be used for this pattern. I used about half a 100g hank of the Oh! gauge is not super important on this project. Materials: • 1 - Oh! Yarn from HiKoo® by skacel, 100% Super Baby Alpaca, Bulky (5), 191 yards, 100 grams, Color used is Charcoal • Size US 10 16” Circular or DPNs • Stitch Marker • Yarn Needle
